channel.title: CVE Feed for Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- MELSEC-F Series FX3U-16MT/ES
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- MELSEC-F Series FX3U-16MT/ES

item.title: CVE-2023-4699|2024-08-02T07:37:59.392Z -- mitsubishi%20electric%20corporation -- melsec-f%20series%20fx3u-16mt%2Fes
item.description: Insufficient Verification of Data Authenticity vulnerability in Mitsubishi Electric Corporation MELSEC-F Series main modules and MELSEC iQ-F Series CPU modules allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to reset the memory of the products to factory default state and cause denial-of-service (DoS) condition on the products by sending specific packets.

item.title: CVE-2023-4562|2024-08-02T07:31:06.356Z -- mitsubishi%20electric%20corporation -- melsec-f%20series%20fx3u-16mt%2Fes
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in Mitsubishi Electric Corporation MELSEC-F Series main modules allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to obtain sequence programs from the product or write malicious sequence programs or improper data in the product without authentication by sending illegitimate messages.
